name: City Car Parking Sim Test 2016-Real Car Driving 3D
name_original: City Car Parking Sim Test 2016-Real Car Driving 3D
description:
City Car Parking Sim Test 2016-Real Car Driving 3D is a new park simulation game in which your driving and parking skills are tested with various parking missions at each stage. There are huge varieties of realistic cars having different performance in garage.
Car Parking Game 3D is an amazing car parking simulator game that requires highest precision! The parking situation in Car Parking Game 3D will require you to show top skills in steering, acceleration, and obstacle avoidance to get those vehicles parked in parking places. As the parking lot driver, you will drive the awesome cars around corners, obstacles, and parking lot borders with speed and accuracy.
Features:
* Realistic vehicle controls,
* Back to improve your ability to restore the park.
* Steering Increases your mastery.
* Realistic car driving experience.
* Excellent high quality graphics.
* Enjoy driving with different camera angles.
* Real-car driving physics.
* Realistic engine sound.
